subject: Term Life Issued In Minutes
body:
American Life Direct has the World's Fastest Term Life Policy.

10 Minutes from now... your term life policy could be in force. 


INSTANT APPROVAL and POLICY ISSUED online in 10 minutes!

* Get Quote - 1 minute
* Online Application - 3 minutes
* Instant Approval - 2 minutes
* CCard or Check - 2 minutes
* Print Your IN FORCE Policy - 7 minutes

Total Time = 15 Minutes! 

Print out your New Policy immediately 
and be secure in the knowledge that your term life policy is in effect.

NO paperwork. NO agents. NO appointments. NO hassles. NO waiting. NO red tape.

Please visit our site for all the information:


To stop receiving announcements:

American Life Direct
27881 La Paz, Suite G-157
Laguna Niguel, CA 92677


Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because producttestpanel@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from Copper Banana. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
